DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , open-label study 10 patient Central Post Stroke Pain ( CPSP ) . The study evaluate effect peripheral nerve blockade spontaneous pain evoke thermal mechanical response CPSP , assess associated local anesthetic pharmacokinetics .
DOC.brief_title: Peripheral Sensory Input Central Post Stroke Pain ( CPSP )
DOC.criteria: Each subject must meet following criterion : Age ≥18 ; CPSP affect upper low limb , distribution may completely cover peripheral nerve block ; Patient fulfill mandatory criterion CPSP , fulfill least one supportive criterion , definite CPSP probability grading . Pain duration least 3 month ; Spontaneous pain intensity ( average pain past week ) ≥ 4 010 Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) . Exclusion Criteria Subjects enrol follow criterion exist : Not give consent participate study ; Significant psychiatric cognitive impairment ; Moderate severe renal liver failure ; Concomitant treatment warfarin anticoagulant ; Pregnancy lactation .
